alert.note: Alert for Bracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN BRACKEN, SOUTHEASTERN CLERMONT, BROWN, NORTHWESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Georgetown, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Mount Orab, Bethel, Augusta, Winchester, Sardinia, Felicity, Belfast, New Market, Emerald, Russellville, Hamersville, Mowrystown, Higginsport, St. Martin, Chasetown, Danville in Highland County, State Route 32 at US Route 68, Feesburg and Fincastle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
